column2: How dutiful of them to come and tame the esper in a stroke.[~]A lovely little flourish.
All the same, they’ve merely doomed the last ox to the yoke.[~]Ha ha ha ha ha!
And I don’t see any elevators.
We’ll just have to climb up one the-step at a time.
C’mon! I know we can the-do it!
Yeah, easy! Says the fox hitching a ride!
